h1_content: Gray-Bronze Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.
h2_content:
After the fight with Father of Stones, go through the door and follow the path. You'll come to a cave, which you'll need to pass through to go to the lower level of the valley.
As you come outside of the cave, you'll need to go left and up a narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.

Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter. This excerpt merges content from both the main and sub-sections. The sub-section is titled 'How to Find Gray-Bronze Cart', and the detailed content is as follows:
After the fight with Father of Stones, go through the door and follow the path. You'll come to a cave, which you'll need to pass through to go to the lower level of the valley.
As you come outside of the cave, you'll need to go left and up a narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.
